nodes.text: The Imperial Resource Procurement Bureau, or ReProBu, was a department of the Galactic Empire.
Major Stipling worked for this Bureau. His mission was the search for raw materials for the Imperial war machine.
As of 0 ABY, a Rebel squad of Reekeene's Roughnecks impersonated ReProBu inspectors to audit the Imperial mine of Alabash. They changed the markings of their ship, Long Shot, to match their cover.
It was unknown whether it had any relation with Imperial Supply, Logistics and Supply, or Imperial Department of Munitions Resource Development, which had similar tasks.
